text:
Typo in

JDBC Data Sources:
4. Configure Tomcat's Resource Factory

"Note that the resource name (here, jdbc/EmployeeDB) must match the value 
specified in the web application deployment descriptor. Customize the value of 
the mail.smtp.host parameter to point at the server that provides SMTP service 
for your network"

The reference to mail.smtp.host is not needed here.
Fixed in the HEAD branch. Nightly from 11/15 will have the fix.
creator: remm@apache.org
